    • statusCode

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> statusCode(int code)
      Builds criteria to match status code of a response.
      Parameters:
      code - is the expected status code.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • responseUrl

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> responseUrl(String stringURL)
      Builds criteria to match url of a response.
      Parameters:
      stringURL - expected url of a response defined as string.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • responseUrl

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> responseUrl(URL url)
      Builds criteria to match url of a response.
      Parameters:
      url - expected url of a response defined as URL.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • urlMatches

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> urlMatches(String expression)
      Builds criteria to match url of a response.
      Parameters:
      expression - is a substring that url of a response is supposed to have. It is possible to pass regexp pattern that url should fit.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • responseURLHost

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> responseURLHost(String host)

      Returns:
      criteria.

      Returns:
      criteria.

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> responseURLProtocolMatches(String expression)
      Builds criteria to match http response url by protocol value.
      Parameters:
      expression - is a substring that protocol is supposed to have. It is possible to pass regexp pattern that scheme should fit.
      Returns:
      criteria.

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> priorResponse(Criteria<okhttp3.Response> responseCriteria)
      Builds criteria to match http response by prior response.
      Parameters:
      responseCriteria - is criteria for prior response
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • priorResponse

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> priorResponse()
      Builds criteria to match http response by presence of prior response.

      criteria.

    • message

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> message(String expected)

    • messageMatches

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> messageMatches(String expression)

    • headerValue

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> headerValue(String name, String value)
      Checks header of response. It is expected that response has defined header with value that contains defined string.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of header response is supposed to have
      value - is the value of header response is supposed to have
      Returns:
      criteria

    • headerValueMatches

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> headerValueMatches(String name, String valueExpression)
      Checks header of response. It is expected that response has defined header with value that contains string with defined substring / regex.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of header response is supposed to have
      valueExpression - is the substring the header value is supposed to have or the RegExp the header value is predicted to match
      Returns:
      criteria

    • isSuccessful

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> isSuccessful()
      Builds criteria to match http response by status code. A response is expected to have the code is in [200..300), which means the request was successfully received, understood, and accepted.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • isRedirect

      public static Criteria<okhttp3.Response> isRedirect()
      Builds criteria to match http response. It is expected that a response redirects to another resource
      Returns:
      criteria.
